title: what this years urf should change from last years.
body:
instead of 80% cdr, cdr can no longer be built, instead every skill now has a 1 second cd.

this is the only change that urf could use, and it would make for some insane unbalanced fun.

This would just be stupid.. Can you imagine all of the ult's people would spam? Sure it's suppose to be "Ultra Rapid Fire" but this would be going overboard.

Nah dude that would be boring af. Imagine Karth ults with 1 second. Just spam til penta. Or ap ezreal just ulting down lane for kills/ until minions take the tower. That's why it's 80% cdr instead of every skill set to a certain time

you know, normal urf is boring af. once the meta kicked in and you couldn't just play whatever, and then tey had t ostart balancing it, it was stupid.

i mean, karth ult would be stupid, ut so would all the global ults, and all the invulnerability ults. and most of the ults, imagine the ekko ult, he would suddenly become an untargetable instakill explosion. gp ult, it's raining cannons everywhere. kayle is just not killable so long as she keeps from being cced, but you can get cced forever by leona and the constant aa resets on her stun.

it would lack the stupid meta, and it would be a much better cahnge of pace. with retarded synergies and no need to be balanced because it wasn't meant to be fair.
